attributes.action: I want there to be multi faith space rooms present in all schools.
attributes.additional_details:
Multi faith spaces are  present within locations where we spend an insignificant amount of time at whereas we spend  1/4 of our a day at school 5 times a week.
The presence of a multi faith space is not only for those who are practising religion but it is a room to go and contemplate spiritually.
It will be a location  where teachers and students can go and practice and manifest their religion as this is one of our human rights.
attributes.background: Having been a victim of religious discrimination and experienced segregation due to my religious background it has triggered my motivation in helping to ease racial tensions and create a genuine interfaith dialogue.
